author: sky.cactus
content: Can you please reach out to BitPay as well during your crusade?  They **force** you to use legacy transactions (effectively) and the transaction will revert if you don't use the fee they picked.

author: sky.cactus
content: I just paid an unnecessary extra 0.003 ETH in unnecessary fees, plus the cost of failed transaction, because of this.

author: thinkingbyzantine
content: <@301186049323958275> quick question why are the fees for swapping a coin on a dex cost more then simply sending eth from one address to another?

author: sky.cactus
content: The fees are a function of cost to the network of the transaction.

author: sky.cactus
content: A more complex transaction will cost more because it used more resources.
